acupoint.standard_location: 在颞部，当眉梢与目外眦之间，向后约一横指的凹陷处
acupoint.standard_location_en: In the temporal region, in the depression about one finger-breadth posterior to the midpoint between the lateral end of the eyebrow and the outer canthus
acupoint.simple_method: 眉梢和眼角中间，向后一横指的凹陷（太阳穴）
acupoint.simple_method_en: In the temple area: find the point between eyebrow tip and outer eye corner, then one finger-width back into the depression.
acupoint.anatomical: 在颞筋膜和颞肌之间；有颞浅动静脉；布有耳颞神经及面神经的颧支
functions: 清肝明目 (clear liver, brighten eyes)
疏风止痛 (dispel wind, relieve pain)
